Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord whispered at Trinity  "go Kitty-bot, the girl needs someone 
nice like you that take care of her."

And he answered in whispers at Areotaur "But they need a keeper in 
good conditions and I could give you time if were necessary.. and 
don't worry a hawk have more than a way to defend itself"

Nighlight tried to stand up but she fell. She knew that she couldn't 
help them so much, and was afraid for her helpers safely.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She saw him with the staff. "Aerotaur, he's not going to be mean.  
> He's a nice bot." She looked up at the hawk bot. "Aren't you a nice 
> bot?" she said, looking up at his face with a half smile.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >      "Get behind me Windlord I can more than defend the three of 
> you and I 
> > couldn't let you defend us in your weakened condition.  My lady 
you 
> will have 
> > to get down for now until we know if he is friend or foe."  He 
> draws his 
> > double bladed staff in order to defend them should the need arise.
